results.name: After School (itch) (Zaksley, fuegoglol, JF_Girard, PatMcRea, Zankanotachi)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: If you can run the steam Client you should be good
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-4130
  • Memory: 2048 MB MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB
  • Additional Notes: The game may run on computers with lower specs but we haven't tested on lower specs

Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on 13.4 but should work on older version
  • Processor: Any Intel or Apple Silicon Should work.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-4130
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game may run on computers with lower specs, but we haven't tested on lower specs.
